intrebare?: If a work is in the Public Domain, it means:
raspuns1: You can copy it without getting Permission from anyone.
raspuns2: You can find it at a public library.
raspuns3: You can get it for free online.
raspuns4: The Term of copyright in the work has run out.
raspuns corect: The Term of copyright in the work has run out.

intrebare?: Creative commons allows copyright holders to:
raspuns1: Grant unlimited and unrestricted copyright protection to their work.
raspuns2: Put their work in the public domain.
raspuns3: Restrict users from accessing their work online.
raspuns4: Make their work available for public use, under specific conditions.
raspuns corect: Make their work available for public use, under specific conditions.
